hadiths.text: Ibn Abbis (Allah be pleased with him) reported that Mu'awiya b. Abu Safyin had told him:I clipped the hair (from the head of) Allah's Messenger (may peace he upon him) with a clipper while he was at al-Marwa, or I saw him getting his hair clipped with a clipper as he was at al-Marwa

chapter.eng-name: It is permissible for the pilgrim performing Umrah to shorten his hair and he does not have to shave it. It is recommended for him to shave his hair or shorten it at Al-Marwah
